leftHalf.title: S3-compatible object storage solutions
leftHalf.copy: Object storage is ideal for organizations with large, unstructured data collections that grow rapidly. S3-compatible object storage enables developers to store unstructured data while using the same interface as Amazon S3, but with a different cloud provider for increased flexibility and control over costs.

relatedBlades.title: What is S3-compatible object storage?
relatedBlades.copy:
Object storage is a highly flexible and scalable type of cloud storage, capable of cheaply storing massive amounts of unstructured data. S3-compatible object storage is cloud storage that is compatible with the Amazon S3 object storage service.

It enables developers and organizations to use preexisting S3 tools, extensions, and libraries for managing data objects even though they are stored on a non-S3 platform.

imageAssetFile.altText: S3 compatible object storage solutions - Problem section - illustration
imageAssetFile.title: S3 compatible object storage solutions - Problem section - illustration

relatedBlades.title: Challenges from being locked in to one storage platform

columnContent.title: Lack of flexibility
columnContent.description: Using one cloud provider's tools and storage can result in being locked in to that provider.

columnContent.title: High egress fees
columnContent.description: Relying on S3 alone means that any time stored data is accessed from outside of S3, high egress fees are incurred.

columnContent.title: Difficult migration
columnContent.description: Using non-S3-compatible object storage makes it difficult to move from S3, because internal tools will need to be reconfigured or re-selected if they are not S3-compatible.

relatedBlades.title: Benefits of S3-compatible object storage solutions

columnContent.title: Easy migration
columnContent.description: S3-compatible storage makes it simple to move data from one vendor to another, or to back up data with another object storage provider.

iconAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare arrow orange - APPROVED Web Icons

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare arrow orange - APPROVED Web Icons

columnContent.title: Reduced vendor lock-in
columnContent.description: Maintain flexibility by storing objects across multiple providers or duplicating object storage databases, ensuring you can pivot between cloud providers if necessary.

columnContent.title: Control over costs
columnContent.description: Adopting S3-compatible storage gives organizations a choice of vendors and provides greater control over costs such as egress fees.

columnContent.title: Simple data retrieval
columnContent.description: Use the same tools, utilities, plugins, extensions, and interfaces that are already used with S3 to search for and retrieve objects.

relatedBlades.title: Key use cases for S3-compatible object storage

cards.title: Machine learning training sets
cards.description: Machine learning models require massive amounts of data for training. S3-compatible object storage provides an efficient, searchable environment for storing and backing up these data sets.

cards.title: Storage for log data
cards.description: S3-compatible object storage can easily store large data collections that grow quickly, such as logs. Object storage can keep logs indefinitely available for later analysis.

cards.title: Audio and video archives
cards.description: Activities and devices that generate large amounts of audiovisual content, such as security cameras, can store their data for the long term with S3-compatible object storage.

cards.title: Backups for ransomware recovery
cards.description: Since it can expand almost infinitely at a low cost, object storage works well for backing up files. In the event of a ransomware attack, an organization can restore files from a backup instead of paying the ransom.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare R2: Global object storage with zero egress fees
relatedBlades.eyebrowHeading: How Cloudflare delivers S3-compatible object storage

columnContent.title: S3-compatible API
columnContent.description: With the R2 object storage service, Cloudflare offers an S3-compatible API for accessing the wide range of S3 tools, libraries, and extensions.

columnContent.title: Predictable pricing
columnContent.description: R2 does not charge egress fees. Organizations are charged based on the total volume of data stored and two classes of operations on that data.

columnContent.title: Security
columnContent.description: R2 provides strong security with undiscoverable bucket names and randomized URLs for each bucket.

columnContent.title: Data stored in nearest region
columnContent.description: R2 automatically selects a bucket location in the closest available region to the "create bucket" request. With the Cloudflare global network, which has locations in over %{CountryCount} countries around the world, data is never far from users.

SYBO adopted R2 to support creative assets for in-game campaigns. In the past, the company's designers were limited by bandwidth and cost constraints. But by hosting creative assets on R2, SYBO is now able to provide its designers with much more creative freedom to maintain their games' top-tier quality. SYBO can also serve creative assets to users affordably.

Fully integrated with [Cloudflare Workers](https://workers.cloudflare.com/), the Cloudflare global network, and the rest of the Cloudflare platform, R2 allows Caliente to store its data on the edge without vendor lock-in or the expense of accessing it. R2's lack of egress fees saves them thousands of dollars each month.

In transitioning to the cloud, Porsche Informatik needed to ensure high availability and optimal performance for users around the world. They used R2 and Workers to build and run applications near the end user, reducing bandwidth costs and providing massive performance and usability improvements.

relatedBlades.bladeName: S3-compatible object storage solutions - FAQ accordion
relatedBlades.title: S3-compatible object storage FAQs

content.value: S3-compatible object storage refers to object storage solutions that are compatible with Amazon S3: they can store data in the same format and integrate with the same tools for managing and searching for data.

Object storage solutions are a type of cloud storage offered by various service providers. Object storage is highly scalable — in practice offering almost unlimited scalability — and can store unstructured data of any size and any format.

Its extreme scalability makes object storage a popular choice for developers and organizations that generate or rely upon vast quantities of data. Training data for AI, log storage, audiovisual data storage, and system backups are all common use cases for object storage solutions.

Egress costs are the fees charged for retrieving data from a storage environment. While keeping data in object storage is typically cost-effective, the cost of retrieving that data can be high. Some object storage solution providers, such as Cloudflare, use an alternate pricing model and charge no egress fees.

Cloudflare R2 is distributed object storage that does  not charge egress fees. R2 is S3-compatible, enabling developers to rely on multi-cloud architectures, maintain their flexibility, and migrate easily between object storage providers.

accordionElements.title: Is Cloudflare R2 compatible with S3?

content.value: Cloudflare R2 is compatible with S3. R2's S3-compatible API allows developers to access a wide range of S3 tools, libraries, and extensions.
